name: Santa's Pillage
description:
Welcome to the north pole! You can meet Satan - I mean Santa, and see his pillage- I mean village. Good luck escaping the north pole. Made for 1 or 2 players. All art work, music, code, and design is completely original by Zac Waite, with support from Elle Waite and Weiqi Xu (Make sure you have the volume on to hear the music). Written in pure Javascript - no softwares, no libraries, no youtube tutorials, no teachers.

Comment any changes you want to see before 2021 and I will put them into effect.
